user_input: 適合情境： 下午強烈斜射光、建築街景、湛藍大海、紅磚牆。追求極致的色彩紮實感。

output.note: Chosen 'Positive Film' to maximize the depth of the 'Ricoh Blue' sea and the richness of red brick walls. HDF is OFF and Clarity/Sharpness are boosted (+2) to capture the hard textures of architecture under strong sun. A negative shadow contrast (-2) and slight underexposure ensure colors remain dense and solid rather than washed out.
